definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: Second, note the differences in those paces.
sentences.chinese: 其次，注意这些配速之间的差异。

sentences.english: Will running at a moderate pace become the ideal training rate?
sentences.chinese: 是否中低配速跑即将成为理想的训练方式呢？

sentences.english: Adjust your pace on each lap so that you run a little faster during the last 2 laps.
sentences.chinese: 配速需要每圈调整，使您最后2圈跑得略快些。

sentences.english: Run the pickups at about your 5-K race pace.
sentences.chinese: 提速跑约为您的5K比赛配速。

sentences.english: Track your splits per mile for post-run analysis.
sentences.chinese: 为训练之后的分析，记录每英里的配速。

definition: to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
to start running/the start of a race
ultramarathon/abbr. for 超級馬拉松|超级马拉松[chao1 ji2 ma3 la1 song1]
dial or meter for displaying speed, time, or other measurements/cyclocomputer/code table (computing)
